title: Fan Pass Regular Season Games
body: What games do I need to watch in order to complete the mission?

replies.body: Been having the same problems. Fix the mission soon please Rito, I cannot finish it!!
Same issue I cannot finish the 1st mission requiring “Watch 3 regular season games from this split on watch.lolesports.com & Play 5 games.” It is bugged and riot needs to fix the mission!
I had an issue with chrome not letting me remain logged in (it kept auto logging me out)

Still having issues as well. Watched LCS/LEC/OPL/LCK and none of these updated the mission... 
All were watched live and even some VODS but still didn't register..{{summoner:32}}
Riot pls fix this mission :( Or refund the RP!  Can't even complete this mission :({{sticker:sg-shisa}}
It is really a fuking mission , I have watched many games but  IT STILL NOT COMPLETE.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
i just clicked the lolesports.com link and got taken to a game about to start in 13 minutes from now.{{summoner:4}}
